title: The Redwall Cookbook
description: Don't miss The Redwall Cookbook ! Illustrated in full color with all the charm and magic from the beloved Redwall series, this is a gift like no other for fans of the classic series, old or new.Ever read a Redwall novel and wonder exactly what Abbot’s Special Abbey Trifle is? Or how to make Shrimp ’N Hotroot Soup, that delicacy of otters everywhere? Or Mole’s Favourite Turnip and Tater Deeper ’N Ever Pie? From the simple refreshment of Summer Strawberry Fizz to Great Hall Gooseberry Fool, they’re all here, along with dozens of other favorites sure to turn young hands into seasoned chefs.
author: Brian Jacques
